entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
